SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class Corner

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Corner
public class Corner extends Object
The corner class implements the functionality of a corner in the card. The action that can be made on a corner are:
- cover it;
- count its resource;
- access the related card.

  • Constructor Details

    • Corner

      public Corner(@Nullable @Nullable GameResource frontResource, @Nullable @Nullable GameResource backResource, PlaceableCard cardRef, CornerDirection dir)
      This constructor builds a corner given all the information about it.
      Parameters:
      frontResource - the resource displayed on the front face of the card
      backResource - the resource displayed on the back face of the card
      cardRef - the card with which the corner is associated
      dir - the direction of the corner

    • Corner

      backResource - the resource displayed on the back face of the card
      dir - the direction of the corner

    • Corner

      public Corner(@Nullable @Nullable GameResource frontResource, CornerDirection dir)
      This constructor defaults the back resource to an empty resource.
      Parameters:
      frontResource - the resource displayed on the front face of the card
      dir - the direction of the corner

  • Method Details

    • getCardRef

      public PlaceableCard getCardRef() throws IllegalStateException
      Getter for the reference of the card related to this corner. This method is used to access the information of the card given the corner.
      Returns:
      the card that contains this corner
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if it is a "detached" corner, as in not connected to a card
      IllegalStateException

    • getDirection

      public CornerDirection getDirection()
      Getter for the direction of the corner.
      Returns:
      the direction of the corner;

    • occupy

      public Corner occupy()
      This functions sets the occupation of the corner as true. After its invocation the function isOccupied will return true.
      Returns:
      corner instance

    • isOccupied

      public boolean isOccupied()
      Getter for the boolean value of occupation of the corner. It gives information about the availability of the corner on which to place a card.
      Returns:
      true if a card can be placed on this corner, false otherwise

    • cover

      public Corner cover()
      This method sets the visibility of the corner. After its invocation the method isVisible will return FALSE.
      Returns:
      corner instance

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Getter for the boolean value of visibility of the corner. It returns whether the corner is covered by another card's corner or not.
      Returns:
      TRUE if the selected corner is not covered by any other corner, FALSE otherwise

    • getResource

      public GameResource getResource()
      Getter for the corner resource. An empty corner will return an empty resource, a covered corner will not return a resource.
      Returns:
      the resource visible in the corner, depending on the orientation of the card.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object other)
      Indicates whether some object has the same properties as this one
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      other - the reference object which to compare
      Returns:
      true if the object is the same as the argument; false otherwise

    • compare

      public boolean compare(Corner other)
      This method compare two corners and defines whether they are equal.

      The parameters checked are:
      - Front resource;
      - Back resource;
      - Direction;
      - Occupation and visibility;

      Parameters:
      other - the corner with which to compare
      Returns:
      true if the two corners are equal; false otherwise
